content: **yarn ** 150 yards of dk weight yarn we used 1 ball of berroco corsica in #3615 **needles ** us 7 / 4 5 mm 16 circulars **or equivalent type & length in size needed to obtain gauge** **notions ** 1 stitch marker darning needle scissors and tape measure **gauge ** 5 stitches & 8 row per inch in broken rib after blocking **sizes ** one size though instructions are given in the pattern to adjust length **measurements ** 16 5 around neck 18 around at base 11 tall
